titles.title: To express the sense of the House of Representatives that the Federal Communications Commission should reconsider and revise rules governing broadband over power line systems based on a comprehensive evaluation of the interference potential of those systems to public safety services and other licensed radio services.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Telecommunications and the Internet.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 4/21/2005--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Federal Communications Commission (FCC) should reconsider and revise rules governing broadband over power line systems based on a comprehensive evaluation, including public review and comment, of the interference potential of those systems to public safety services and other licensed radio services.
